com.diogonunes.jcdp.color.api

Class AbstractColoredPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diogonunes.jcdp.bw.api.AbstractPrinter
      • com.diogonunes.jcdp.color.api.AbstractColoredPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPrinter, IColoredPrinter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColoredPrinter

    public abstract class AbstractColoredPrinter
extends AbstractPrinter
implements IColoredPrinter
    This class is a template of a Colored Printer, hence it contains what is common to each Colored Printer implementation offered by the library. Each Colored Printer of this package should extend this class and thus implement IColoredPrinter interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        protected Ansi.Attribute getAttribute()
        Returns:
        the current attribute; every message will be printed formatted with this attribute.

      • getForegroundColor

        protected Ansi.FColor getForegroundColor()
        Returns:
        the current foreground color; every message will be printed with this foreground color.

      • getBackgroundColor

        protected Ansi.BColor getBackgroundColor()
        Returns:
        the current background color; every message will be printed with this background color.
